column3: Fire damper mechanically fixed to casing
column5: Fire damper is mechanically fixed to the casing with min 1 screw per side and min 200mm spacing betwwen screws

column3: Gaps between fire damper & wall no greater than 25mm
column5: Gaps between the fire damper and wall no greater than 25mm and is filled with Killargo Intumescent Sealant with no cracking visible

column3: Killargo fire rated mastic applied to entire perimeter of fire damper cell
column5: Killargo fire rated mastic has been applied to entire perimeter of fire damper cell on both sides. No evidence of cracking.

column3: Casing perimeter sealed with Killargo intumescent sealant
column5: Casing perimeter is sealed with Killargo intumescent sealant. No evidence of cracking.

column3: Sheet metal thickness is 0.7mm or greater
column5: Sheet metal thickness is 0.7mm or greater.

column3: Ductwork connected to either side of casing with nylon bolts on the flanges
